pros: I really enjoyed my time at CCHA and have only moved on due to progression. CCHA are committed to being a great place to work and something I feel they are achieving. The People are fantastic and everyone has the tenants at heart.
cons: Not a con as such but it's really busy, always striving to improve so don't expect to sit back.
